name: bluebubbles-server
description: BlueBubbles Server is the app that powers the BlueBubbles app ecosystem

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./packages/ui && npm run start" "cd ./packages/server && npm run start"
scripts.build-ui: cd ./packages/ui && npm run build && mkdir -p ../server/dist/static && rm -rf ../server/dist/static && cp -R ./build/** ../server/dist/ && cd ../../
scripts.build-server: ./node_modules/ngrok/bin/ngrok update && cd ./packages/server && npm run dist && cd ../../
scripts.build: npm run build-ui && npm run build-server && rm -rf ./dist && mkdir -p ./dist && cp -R ./packages/server/release/* ./dist/ && rm -rf ./packages/server/release/ && rm -rf ./packages/ui/build/

author: BlueBubbles Development Team <bluebubblesapp@gmail.com>
